flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I got a craving for banana nut bread, but I've found wheat makes my asthma a lot worse, so I needed a Primal/ Paleo recipe. Unfortunately I had no coconut or almond flour, and none of the stores here sell it, so none of the recipes I found were usable. I found this recipe (http://hollywouldifshecould.blogspot.com...) and modified it from there.
guide.introduction_rendered: I got a craving for banana nut bread, but I've found wheat makes my asthma a lot worse, so I needed a Primal/ Paleo recipe. Unfortunately I had no coconut or almond flour, and none of the stores here sell it, so none of the recipes I found were usable. I found this recipe (http://hollywouldifshecould.blogspot.com...) and modified it from there.

lines.text: 3 Small Overripe Bananas (2 if they are bigger)
lines.text_raw: 3 Small Overripe Bananas (2 if they are bigger)

lines.text: 2/3 c. chopped pecans (have extra to sprinkle on top)
lines.text_raw: 2/3 c. chopped pecans (have extra to sprinkle on top)

guide.summary: Great Paleo/ Primal muffins that are incredibly easy to make!
guide.title: Primal Chocolate Banana Nut Muffins (Wheat Free)
